channel.title: Summoning issue (small)
channel.description:
hi guys,
i've added wolpertinger on my server, but i can't summon it. when i try to summon it, it says: invalid familiar, report to an admin.
i've checked in all the files but i don't know what i've done wrong.
does anyone of you know how i can fix this?
thanks,
startcode
